```{r}

list.files("./data/")
```

```{r}
homicides <- read_csv("./data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r}
head(homicides)
```

```{r}
homicides <- homicides %>%
  unite(col = "location", c("city", "state"), sep = ", ")
```

```{r}
 homicides %>%
  select(location, disposition) %>%
  group_by(location, disposition) %>%
  count()
```
